Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

This landmark is the headquarters of the Apostates, and gives the following when annexed:[bulletList][bullet]{ResearchFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ResearchSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{EnergyFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{EnergySlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]In addition, it unlocks the following building in your colony:[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003E300003F5E]Chaos Forge[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

该地标为变节者的总部，吞并奖励如下：[bulletList][bullet]{ResearchFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{ResearchSlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/][bulletlist][bullet]{EnergyFlat}[/bullet][bullet]{EnergySlot}[/bullet][/bulletlist][br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[bulletlist][bullet][hyperlink,000003E300003F5E]混乱熔炉[/hyperlink][/bullet][/bulletlist]

Apostates are a special wildlife group of units.
For references to game terminology and in-world references, please check the glossary delivered as part of the documentation.

This landmark is an advanced Research sector, and gives the following when annexed:[br/]{ResearchFlat}, {ResearchSlot}.[br/]{EnergyFlat}, {EnergySlot}.[br/][br/]In addition, it unlocks the following building in your colony: [hyperlink,000003E300003F5E]Chaos Forge[/hyperlink]
该地标为高级研究区域，吞并奖励如下：[br/]{ResearchFlat}，{ResearchSlot}。[br/]{EnergyFlat}，{EnergySlot}。[br/][br/]另外，还能为你的殖民地解锁以下建筑：[hyperlink,000003E300003F5E]混乱熔炉[/hyperlink]

In the text below, any inserted strings - anything of the form {text} - is replaced by an integer value for the thing described in the brackets. If the {text} is not followed by a unit - e.g. shields, hitpoints - the icon for the unit is inserted together with the integer. The same holds for symbols - e.g. '+', '%' - which are occasionally inserted together with the integer.

"Power to whom power is due! Using our battlesuits to protect the weak would be wasting our potential. The towers we construct show the people of this land where their true masters reside - and where they must bring their offerings." - Blackguard Tax Collector
“权力属于应得的人！用机甲保护弱者就是在浪费我们的潜力。我们建造的塔楼向这片土地上的人们展现了真正的主宰者地位，他们必须向这里供奉。”——黑卫收税员

"Oh, yes, I'm a witch. Just because I prefer to live in an iron-clad citadel instead of a gingerbread cottage doesn't make me any less wicked or haggy. Some people are so superstitious." - Interview with Marlutha Newteye
“哦，是的，我是个女巫。虽然我更喜欢住在铁甲城堡而不是姜饼屋里，但这并不能让我的邪恶或狠毒受到影响。有些人非常迷信。”——玛尔露萨·纽泰依的专访
"Marlutha Newteye" is the name of a female Chaos Witch.
"Let me guess: in the final level of this trash mob game I have to beat the dark lord in the dark tower. Worst blackest dungeon spin-off ever!" - Rantler the Spacer
“让我猜猜：在这个垃圾暴民游戏的最后一关，我必须击败黑暗高塔中的黑暗领主，对吗？真是有史以来最烂的地牢衍生品！”——太空掠夺者的大声咆哮
"Rantler" is the name of a male Spacer character.

The seat of power of the Apostates holds the secrets to their chaos inducing ways. By manifesting its influence over your armies, they too can benefit from its chaotic properties.[br/][br/]Units you control have their damage decreased by {DamageDown}%, but their attacks gain [abilityblue]Chaotic[/abilityblue] dealing {DamageSingleAmount} ( or {DamageRepeating} for repeating attacks) additional damage of a random damage channel.
变节者的权力中心，藏着有关诱导混乱的秘密。通过对你的军队造成影响，你的军队也将从混乱属性中受益。[br/][br/]你控制的单位的伤害降低 {DamageDown}%，但攻击获得[/abilityblue]混乱[abilityblue]，可额外造成随机伤害类型的 {DamageSingleAmount}（多次攻击为 {DamageRepeating}）伤害。
Chaotic is an Apostate Status Effect, found in Apostates_UnitProperties.xml
This unit deals {DamageDown}% less damage, but its offensive abilities gain [abilityblue]Chaotic[/abilityblue].
此单位造成的伤害降低 {DamageDown}%，但攻击性技能获得[abilityblue]混乱[/abilityblue]。

The forge hides the method of breaking order into chaos, the same process the Chaos Witches utilize to bend reality.[br/][br/]Units produced in this colony gain a {RealityBreakChance}[strengthEntropy/] strength chance of applying [abilityred]Reality Break[/abilityred], which applies a random negative Status Effect that ignores Unit Type restrictions.
熔炉里隐藏着打破秩序进入混沌的方法，混乱女巫正是用这样的方法扭曲现实。[br/][br/]此殖民地生产的单位有 {RealityBreakChance}[strengthEntropy/] 力量几率施加[abilityred]现实破碎[/abilityred]，可随机造成一种负面状态效果，且无视受影响单位类型的限制。
Produced units gain a {RealityBreakChance}[strengthEntropy/] strength chance of applying [abilityred]Reality Break[/abilityred]
生产的单位有 {RealityBreakChance}[strengthEntropy/] 力量几率施加[abilityred]现实破碎[/abilityred]。
Reality Break is an Apostate Status Effect, found in Apostates_UnitProperties.xml

Every {turns}[turn/], the Dark Tower's Chaos Oracle disrupts the strands of fate, choosing {ChaosOracleTargetNumber} random hostile targets, marking those and adjacent hexes. After {Timer}[turn/], the Chaos Oracle's prediction comes true, inflicting [abilityred]Adversity[/abilityred] to Enemy units for {Duration}[turn/], while granting Allied units [abilityblue]Precognition[/abilityblue] for {Duration}[turn/].

每 {turns}[turn/]，黑暗高塔的混乱神谕便会打乱命运的脉络，选择 {ChaosOracleTargetNumber} 个随机敌方单位，标记这些单位及其相邻的单元格。{Timer}[turn/] 后，混乱神谕的预言将显现，使这些敌方单位获得[abilityred]厄运[/abilityred]，持续 {Duration}[turn/]，同时赋予友方单位[abilityblue]预知[/abilityblue]，持续 {Duration}[turn/]。

After {turns}[turn/] this Chaos Field collapses, inflicting [abilityred]Adversity[/abilityred] to Attacker units for {Duration}[turn/], while granting Defender units [abilityblue]Precognition[/abilityblue] for {Duration}[turn/].
混乱力场会在 {turns}[turn/] 后崩塌，对攻击者单位施加[abilityred]厄运[/abilityred]，持续 {Duration}[turn/]，同时给予防守者单位[abilityblue]预知[/abilityblue]，持续 {Duration}[turn/]。
